item.title: 只是开始
item.description: library(ggplot2) p <- ggplot(mpg, aes(class, hwy)) p + geom_boxplot() + ggtitle("火车fadrivr啦") plot(rnorm(100), main = "another图片") library(knitr) kable(head(iris)) Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species 5.1 3.5 1.4 0.2 setosa 4.9 3.0 1.4 0.2 setosa 4.7 3.2 1.3 0.2 setosa 4.6 3.1 1.5 0.2 setosa 5.0 3.6 1.4 0.2 setosa 5.4 3.9 1.7 0.4 setosa
